beforeReleasingPartitions(Map<String, Set<Integer>>) - Method in interface kafka.javaapi.consumer.ConsumerRebalanceListener
This method is called after all the fetcher threads are stopped but before the ownership of partitions are released.
beforeStartingFetchers(String, Map<String, Map<Integer, ConsumerThreadId>>) - Method in interface kafka.javaapi.consumer.ConsumerRebalanceListener
This method is called after the new partition assignment is finished but before fetcher threads start.

ConsumerRebalanceListener - Interface in kafka.javaapi.consumer
